name: Berry Build Bash!
description:
This game was built in 43 hours for the AIE Adelaide Game Jam 2020.

Build you defenses, fire projectiles to squish your opponent's berries!

Players take turns building their defenses, their drag to shoot projectiles at each other's berries. First to destroy all the opponents berries win. 

For two players.

Created by:

Byron Carter

Drennen Millar
